item.description:
As we all know, business is about building relationships inside the office and out. Power lunches, Dinner meetings, Networking events, etc. A solid base in wine and food can be the deal maker. What wines to order for the table? What goes best with the seared scallops? To decant or not to decant? Things To Do Boston and Les Zygomates proudly presents a new seminar specially crafted for the business world.

Wine Education Class

Part One:
Introduction to wine and wine regions.

Part Two:
Wine and it's relationship with food - the art of pairing.

Part Three:
The fun part--eating and drinking!
5 different wines paired with different hors dâ€™oeuvres.

Come prepared to learn but also to have lots of fun.

Sign up today! Space is limited!

To purchase tickets go to:
www.thingstodoboston.com
click on 'See the Full Calendar'
then click on 'NEW EVENT Wine Education Class'
then click on BUY NOW on the right side of the page

See you there!
item.name: Wine Education Class
